summary: This patch solves a few bugs appeared in Perkus Maximus 1.2 related to the Dexterity Perk Tree.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#660000][size=5]T3nd0 has included this patch into Perkus Maximus 1.3 release, so this is no longer necessary.
Thank You guys for downloading and endorsing![/size][/color][color=#660000][size=1] (07-05-15)[/size][/color]


Hi, this is my first mod and it's just a bugfix mod.

This tiny mod solves a few bugs appeared in [b]Perkus Maximus 1.2[/b] by [i]t3nd0[/i] (Hail the Snakey!) related to the Dexterity Perk Tree:
[list=1][*]"Removing the Scaffold" and "Monkey Grip" now work[/*]
[*]Lockpicking gives exp to the player.[/*]
[/list]It can be installed manually or with a mod manager like NMM or MO. It should be loaded after PerkusMaximus_Master and launching the patcher again is advisable.
Installing PerMa 1.2 Hotfix by [i]raulfin[/i] is NOT necessary. This includes it as well.

Enjoy Perkus Maximus!

Thanks [i]t3nd0[/i] and his team for creating such an awesome mod and any modder that helps making Skyrim even a better game than it is already.
And thanks Bethesda!
author: busmath
